column3: News;Kandal: Reports suggest that a fire broke out at a club in ------Ponhea Lueu ------ district
column5: causing one death and three injuries.------Police and firefighters are still at the scene.------Source 1 (breaking): ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/378416------Source 2 (death report)------https://www.facebook.com/BTVCambodia/posts/2070466129911932------UPDATE: ------Death confirmed
